directions: Cook onion in oil in a small heavy skillet over moderate heat, stirring, until pale golden. Stir in raisins, vinegar, water, red pepper flakes, coriander, and salt and simmer 2 minutes.
Transfer to a bowl and cool completely. Stir in mint just before serving.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes
title: Mint Chutney
